HomePage.title: KNOWN WORLDS DATABASE
HomePage.subtitle: Accessing static records from the central mainframe. Encrypted for universal transmission.

kepler.name: Kepler-186f
kepler.description: A giant planet composed mainly of hydrogen and helium. Its atmosphere contains traces of methane, giving it a distinct blue hue visible from the outer rim.

proxima.name: Proxima Centauri b
proxima.description: A rocky world with scorching surface temperatures. Ancient ruins suggest a once-thriving civilization that vanished mysteriously over a millennium ago.

gliese.name: Gliese 667 Cc
gliese.description: Covered entirely by a deep, bioluminescent ocean. The native flora emits a soft pulse of light that synchronizes with the planet's three moons.

comms.title: SUBSPACE TRANSMITTER
comms.status: Live translation uplink. Enter a message to broadcast to allied sectors.
